QuestData.Title: Diplomacy by Another Means
QuestData.Description: In order to infiltrate and disrupt the Blackmaw negotiations, we'll need to know where they're happening. In Blackmaw Hold to the southwest, I suspect you'll find night elven ambassadors milling around, making preparations.$B$B<Haggrum spits on the ground.>$B$BKill them at your leisure, and search the area for important documents. Oh, and grab a set of their ambassador's robes, we'll need them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather a Blackmaw Meeting Agenda at Blackmaw Hold, and kill a Talrendis Ambassador to collect her Ambassador's Robes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the robes? Andorel here has been whipping up some magic for us to use.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work! Let me see those documents. Hmm. Now we know exactly when and where the final negotiations will happen. Don't worry if those robes don't fit you - I've got it all worked out.
